title: Global media voices: China’s international exchanges
text:
Since the People's Republic of China was founded 70 years ago, China has been engaging in international exchange in more and more areas. China extends its hand to help when countries are struck by natural disasters, Chinese athletes have won medals at international sporting events, and Chinese elements have appeared in international fashion shows.

But what is media across the world saying about China's role on the international stage? What stories are being told about the country? Watch the 15th, also the last of our series New China at 70, to discover the answers.

Producers: Wang Hao and Han Lei

Supervisors: Zhang Chunyan and Wang Jianfen

Director: Zhang Yuhuan

Anchor: Ian Goodrum

Script writers: Jiang Wei, Chen Ziyan, Kang Jia, Ian Goodrum, Eoghan Norris McNeill, Guo Kai and Liu Ming

Media coordinators: Li Xin, Tang Lijun, Jiang Yijing, Sun Yubing and Song Ge

Special thanks to our partners:

The Daily Telegraph, The Jakarta Post, The Nation from Thailand, Sputnik from Russia, orient.tm, The National from the UAE, al-ain.com from the UAE, 7D News, news.am, azertag.az, The Ethiopian Herald, Philippines News Agency, The Associated Press of Pakistan, Sri Lanka Mirror and Prensa Latina from Cuba
